ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESGOSites.GID AS GID, ESGOSites.fPersonCodeGID AS fPersonCodeGID, ESGOSites.Code AS Code, ESGOSites.Description AS Description, FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.Code AS Code1 FROM ESGOSites AS ESGOSites LEFT JOIN ESGOPerson AS FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode ON ESGOSites.fPersonCodeGID = FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.GID INNER JOIN ESGOCompany AS FK_ESGOCompany_ESGOPerson ON FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.GID = FK_ESGOCompany_ESGOPerson.fPersonCodeGID WHERE (ESGOSites.KindSite = 1) AND (FK_ESGOCompany_ESGOPerson.Code = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (ESEqual(FK_ESGOPerson_PersonCode.Code, @Code1))
